defs: a pair of eyes; both the eyes of a person.
range or field of vision.
the lustre of the eye.
to turn one's eyes; to change the object of sight.
the contractile circular opening, apparently black, in the center of the iris of the eye; the pupil of the eye.
(fig.) a person or thing that is loved and admired by someone.
lack of light that makes the vision imperfect; such a condition.
a screen, veil, etc. that keeps the objects from being seen.
the act of disappearing.
lack of care; carelessness.
ಕಣ್ಮರೆಯಾಗು kaṇmareyāgu to cease to be seen; to go out of sight; to disappear.
= ಕಣ್ಮಲರು.
(the eyes) to expand; to become wide.
to be realised for an instant in the mind; to flash.
to be diffused through out; to pervade.
to disregard; to treat with scorn or contempt.
= ಕಣ್ಮರೆ.
the art or performing skill of producing baffling effects or illusions by sleight of hand, concealed apparatus, etc.; magic; black magic.
an unreal, deceptive or misleading appearance or image; a false perception of visual image.
to have a glance from the corner of the eye.
the lustre of the eye.
to close and open (one eye or both eyes) quickly; to wink.
to give a signal by winking.
a very short time; (time required for a wink).
a man who blinks or has imperfect sight; a blinkard.
a children's game in which one player tries to find the others, who are hidden; hide-and-seek.
a process of attempting to find an evasive person or thing.
to deliberately ignore (injustice, wrong, etc.).
to close one's eyes; to sleep.
to die.
= ಕಣ್ಮುಚ್ಚಲೆ.
in front of one's eye; obviously.
that which can be seen or is within one's range of vision.
to move the eyes to give a signal.
anything morally bad or wrong; wickedness; depravity; sin; evil.
a man who praises; a praiser.
a particular class of evil spirits.
name of a celebratred sage, foster father of ಶಕುಂತಲೆ.
to look at with wonder, shock or fright and without being able to speak; to be baffled and remain helpless.
a signal, indication given, by movement of the eyes.
an indication about a future event.
= ಕಣ್ಸನ್ನೆ.
the quality that appeals to the eyes.
either of the flat surfaces of the face between the eye and the ear.
acute eye-pain.
to contract the eyes as in fright, abhorrence.
to be frightened, horrified.
the state of being under another's constant vigil or a watchful attention.
to draw another's attention.
to fascinate (with beauty); to charm.
(the eyes) to be tired.
to be attracted or pleased greatly (as by beauty); to be charmed, fascinated.
the state of being attracted by or under the influence of a delightful object.
the quality of an object that enchants the person look at.
a cause; a reason.
deep or intense sorrow; grief.

the reddish-brown or reddish-yellow coating formed on iron or steel by oxidation, as during exposure to air and moisture; any coating or film formed on any other metal by oxidation or corrosion; rust.
the nut of the tree Strychnos potatorum (family: Loganiaceae); clearing nut, ued to clear the water of suspended dirt.
(boiling) noisily; producing the sound (similar to the sound made by boiling water).
= ಕತಕ.
= ಕತ1.
a written doument evidencing the loan availed by a person agreeing to the terms and conditions mentioned therein; a loan deed.
= ಕತಬಿ.
a noisy rushing about; noisy commotion, as of a crowd; uproar; tumult.
the act of contending; strife, struggle, controversy, dispute, quarrel, etc.; contention.
= ಕತರ್ಚು.
(dial.) to become weary; to get fatigued.
to get disgusted; to be annoyed with boredom.
to be affected by a rust; to become coated with rust, as iron.
a kind of cloth.
= ಕತಾಯಿ.
extreme anger; wrath; fury; rage.
to become very angry; to be infuriated, enraged.
a certain indefinite or unspecified number, quantity, etc. as distinguished from the rest; some; a few.
a source of a stream, river.
to tell, narrate - a) to give a continuous story or account of; b) to provide a spoken commentary for.
= ಕತಿಯಿಸು.

a story - a) an account of imaginary or past events; a narrative, tale or anecdote; b) a fictitious literary composition in prose or poetry, shorter than a novel; a narrative; a tale; c) the past course of the life of a person or institution etc; d) the narrative or plot of a novel or play etc.; storyline; d) a mere tale, an account with no basis in fact.
any dull, tiresome, boring narration.
a persisting, perplexing problem; ಅದೊಂದು ಕತೆ adondu kate (fig.) a different thing altogether, a matter requiring or meriting separate treatment.
to write, produce a story.
to fabricate a rason, lie, etc.; to give a pretext; to go for an excuse with false reason or motive.
= ಕತೆಗಾರ.
(masc.) a writer or teller of a story or stories.
the skill, style or the ability of a person in telling, narrating or writing a story.
(fem.) a writer or teller of a story or stories.
to tell, narrate a story.
(a narrating, telling of a story) to be over.
(fig.) to be done with, finished, over; to lose one's power, authority, etc.
to die.
to tell, narrate a story or account of.
the prepared fiber of the husks of coconuts, used to make matting and rope; coir.
a rope or a piece of rope made of this.
(dial.) the skin (of a fruit, seed, etc.) which is removed.
any of the shaped sheets of canvas or other strong material spread to catch or deflect the wind, by means of which some vessels are driven forward; a sail.
= ಕತ್ತಗಿರಿ.
a medicinal plant; (=ಕತ್ತಗಿರಿ?).
the creeper Aristolochia bracteata of Aristolochiaeae family (said to be an antidote to snake-bites).
a small drum, esp. one used to accompany the main artist in a musical concert; a tabor.
a particular manner or style in playing his instrument.
= ಕತ್ತರಿ2.
(wrestling) to hold the rival unmoved, locked either with the cross hands or legs; to use ಕತ್ತರಿಪಟ್ಟು.
the act of removing a part or parts, by cutting from the main body or a whole.
to be cut off, severed.
the fruit of the eggplant, Solanum melongena of Solanaceae family, eaten as a vegetable; brinjal.
the plant itself.
the creeper Capparis sepiaria (= C. grandiflora) of Capparaceae family.
= ಕತ್ತರಿಪಟ್ಟು.
an instrument for cutting fabric, paper, hair, etc., having two pivoted blades with finger and thumb holes in the handles, operating by closing on the material to be cut; a pair of scissors.
a kind of arrow having 'V' shaped end.
the triangular structure in a bullock-driven oil mill or in a bullock-cart, where the driver sits.
a place at which two roads intersects each other.
(fig.) a very difficult or inescapable situation; a dilemma.
(fig.) a cut, reduction or defecit.
the quality of a cheat.

ಕತ್ತರಿ ಆಡಿಸು kattari āḍisu (fig.) to cut off, censor a part or parts (as from a film, story, etc.); 2. (fig.) to cheat (a person, firm organisation etc.) of money; to take illegal commission in a deal; ಕತ್ತರಿ ಹಾಕು kattari hāku = ಕತ್ತರಿ ಆಡಿಸು.
a man who cuts with or as with a pair of scissors.
the act of cutting.
the act of reducing, causing a defecit.
a narrow passage, rift etc made to catch wild animals.
to cut, severe using a pair of scissors.
to cut (with a sword, knife, etc.) as to fell the object down.
(masc.) a thief who cuts the pockets of persons and steals their purses, as in crowds.
= ಕತ್ತರಿಪಟ್ಟು.
the triangular structure in a bullock-driven oil mill or in a bullock-cart, where the driver sits.
a kind of plant.
= ಕತ್ತರಿಗುಬ್ಬಿಗುಳ್ಳ.
(used in pl.) hands held with the fore-arms crossing each other on the chest, as in prayer.
to be cut, severed.
to stand erect.
to be locked in wrestling by kattaripaṭṭu.
to grip, hold , seize with or as with a pair of sciscors.
= ಕತ್ತರಿಗೊಳ್.
to hold or squeeze firmly with a pair of scissors.
to hold firmly between the arm and the side of the body or between the two legs, in wrestling.
a length of wood, 'Y'-shaped at one end, heavy one of which is used as a support from below for a roof, platform, and the thin one to handle thorny plants etc.
(wrestling) a particular lock in which the rival is held unmoved with either the crossed hands or legs.
= ಕತ್ತರಿಬದನೆ.
a plant of Solanaceae family.
a kind of golden ornament for the ear.
to be or become deficient, insufficient; to become inadequate in amount or numbers.
the creeper bush Capparis spinosa of Capparaceae family.
an ear (of a person) that is pointed upward.
(fig.) to be keen to hear (something); to erect one's ears.
to become as sharp as the blade of scissors.
a road that intersects another road; cross road.
an old tax levied on tailors and cobblers (now obs.).
= ಕತ್ತರಿವಾೞೆ.
a variety in plantain with sharp-edged leaves (?).
(dial.) an arrangement of betel leaves in a criss-cross manner, offered after a feast.
the work or profession of a tailor or cobbler.
to cut, cut off or cut out with a pair of scissors, knife, sword, etc.
to reduce the quantity, numbers, volume, etc.
(derog. or contemp.) to eat (large quantity of food).
any of a number of soil-dwelling caterpillars (family Noctuidae) that feed on young plants of cabbage, corn, etc., cutting them off at ground level; a cut-worm.
= ಕತ್ತರಿ2.
the plant Opuntia elatior (=Cactusindicus) of Cactaceae family.
to make dark or darker.
to become dark or darker.
to become dark or darker.
to make dark or darker.
to cherish ill will.
the state of being without light; absence of light; darkness.
(phil.) lack of knowledge, esp. spiritual ignorance.
= ಕತ್ತಲು.
a children's game played in darkness.
= ಕತ್ತಲಿಸು.
the partial or total obscuring of the sun when the moon comes between it and the earth; solar eclipse (so called as it happens only on new-moondays).
a house or a room that lacks sufficient light.
a building to which persons are committed while awaiting trial or for punishment (as such buildings normally lack proper light and ventilation); a jail.
the moon (as compared to a resplendent jewel in the sky during nights).
[grammatically wrong compound] the sun, the destroyer of darkness.
[fr. ಕರ್ತವ್ಯ] any action, task, etc. required by or relating to one's occupation, position or imposed by a law; a duty.
a military coat used by soldiers to protect the body inthe battle-field; a mail.
a white horse.
a metal cover for the body (esp. of a deity).
any cover.
a short sword; a dagger.
the plant a) Aloe barbadensis (= A. Vera) of Liliaceae family.
the plant Agave sisalana of Agavaceae family.
= ಕತ್ತಾಳಿ.
the tree Pandanus fascicularis (= P. odoratissimus, = P. tectorius) of Pandanaceae family.
a hand weapon having a long, sharp-pointed blade, usu. with a sharp edge on one or both sides, set in a hilt; a sword.
a single-edged, short instrument used to cut fruits and vegetables; a knife.
a sharp-edged cutting instrument for shaving off or cutting hair; a razor.

ಕತ್ತಿ ಕಟ್ಟು katti kaṭṭu to do something against the interest of or with an intent to destroy, another; to be hostile to; ಕತ್ತಿ ಮಸೆ katti mase (fig.) to be ready for a fight; to be a bitter enemy of; to be at daggers drawn; ಕತ್ತಿಯ ಮೇಲೆ ಕಸರತ್ತು/ಸಾಮು ಮಾಡು kattiya mēle kasarattu/sāmu māḍu to execute a dangerous or delicate work with great care; ಕತ್ತೀ ಬಾಯಲ್ಲಿದ್ದ ತುಪ್ಪನೆಕ್ಕಿ ನಾಲಿಗೆ ಸೀಳಿಕೊ kattī bāyallidda tuppa nekki nālige sīḷiko to land in a great, obvious danger attempting for a trivial gain.
the avenue tree Delonix regia (= Poinciana regia) of Ceasalpiniaceae family; gold mohur tree; peacock flower tree.
a fighting with the sword.
name of a tribe mostly living in forests.
a male member of this tribe.
to pull out the sword from its sheath.
a tool consisting of a crescent-shaped blade with a short handle used for cutting down tall grass, weeds, etc. 2) a short, thick, curving sword with a single cutting edge; a cutlas.
any religion, system etc. brutally forced on people.
the condition of extreme hatred resulting in mutual fighting; the state of being at swordś points.
any of the only species (Xiphias gladius) of a family (Xiphiidae) of large, marine, percoid food and game fishes having a sail-like dorsal fin and a long, flat, swordlike upper jawbone; a swordfish.
a fighting with a sword; a sword-fight.
(masc.) an expert in the use of, and a fighter with the sword.
a learning, gaining expertise in sword-fight.
to cause to catch fire (as a wick); to light (a lamp).
to catch fire.
to be lighted; to be made to give off light.
to cause to give off light; to light.
to shout aloud, as in anger or pain; to scream; to bellow.
the part of the body connecting the head to the shoulders; the neck.
the shoulder - a) the joint connecting the arm or forelimb with the body; b) the part of the body including this joint and extending to the base of the neck.
writing done by hand with a pen, pencil, etc.
a person's particular style of writing.
a man who writes (usu. whose work or occupation is writing); a writer.
that part of a garment which covers, encircles or is nearest the neck; neck; collar.
a person (esp. a woman) having no ornament around the neck.
a substance with a strong, penetrating odor, obtained from a small sac (musk bag) under the skin of the abdomen in the male musk deer, which is used as the basis of numerous perfumes; musk.
the flowering creeper a) Jasminum hirsutum, b) Jasminum multiflorum (=J. pubescens), both of Oleaceae family.
the plant Ocimum basilicum of Lamiaceae family; sweet basil.
the strong penetrating odor of musk.
a paste made using musk.
a sectarian mark of musk on the forehead.
water perfumed with musk.
(masc.) a paramour perfumed with musk.
a sectarian mark of musk on the forehead.
a kind of plant of the family of Lamiaceae, akin to marjoram, known for its musk-like odor.
a small, hornless deer (Moschus moschiferus) of the uplands of central Asia, the male of which secretes musk and has tusklike upper canines; a musk deer.
a kind of bangles women wear.
= ಕತ್ತುರಿಮಿಗ.

any of several nocturnal, catlike carnivores (family Viverridae) of India, with spotted, yellowish fur, that are valued for their yellowish, fatty substance with a musklike scent, used in making some perfumes; a civet-cat.
= ಕತ್ತುರಿ.
the grass Sorghum nitidum (=Andropogon serratus) of Poaceae family with fragrant roots.
any of a number of horselike perissodactylous mammals (family Equidae) having long ears and a short mane, and are domesticated, known for hard work; a donkey.
a person regarded as stupid, foolish or obstinate, meant ony for hard work.
a term of abuse.

ಕತ್ತೆ ಒದ್ದಂತೆ ಮಾತನಾಡು katte oddante mātanāḍu to talk lacking respect, regard to the other person; to talk roughly and awkwardly; ಕತ್ತೆ ಕಸ್ತೂರಿ ಹೊತ್ತಹಾಗೆ katte kasturi hotta hāge (simile) an ass is an ass, though laden with gold; ಕತ್ತೆ ಕಾಯು katte kāyu (derog. to say) 'you are an useless person'; ಕತ್ತೆ ಕಿವುಡು katte kivuḍu completely deaf; deaf as an adder; ಕತ್ತೆಗೆ ಆದ ಹಾಗೆ ವಯಸ್ಸಾಗು kattege āda hāge vayassāgu (used deregotively) to advance in age without matching wisdom or knowledge; ಕತ್ತೆಗೆ ಚಳಿಬರುವ ಮಾತು kattege caḷibaruva mātu (rightly - ಕಂಥೆಗೆ ಚಳಿಬರುವ ಮಾತು) (a saying) 'this is an unnatural happening or an impractical event; 'no one can believe thiś; ಕತ್ತೆಗೇಕೆ ಬತ್ತದ ಸುದ್ದಿ? kattegēke battada suddi = ಕತ್ತೆ ಬಲ್ಲುದೆ ಕತ್ತುರಿಯ ಪರಿಮಳವ?; ಕತ್ತೆ ದುಡಿದ ಹಾಗೆ ದುಡಿ katte duḍida hāge duḍi to work very hard without stopping, (often without proper reward or recognitition); to work like a beaver; ಕತ್ತೆ ಖಂಡುಗ ಹೊತ್ತರೆ ಸೆಟ್ಟೀತನ ಮಾಡೀತೆ? katte khaṇḍuga hottare settītana māḍīte? a stupid person remains stupid despite hard work; ಕತ್ತೆ ತಿಂದೂ ಹಾಳುಮಾಡಿತು, ಹೊರಳಿಯೂ ಹಾಳುಮಾಡಿತು katte tindū hāḷumāḍitu, horaḷiyū hāḷumāḍitu a lubber is a liability in all ways; ಕತ್ತೆ ಬಲ್ಲುದೆ ಕತ್ತುರಿಯ ಪರಿಮಳವ? katte ballude katturiya parimaḷava? an ass loaded with gold still eats thistles; ಕತ್ತೆಯ ಮೊಲೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಖಂಡುಗ ಹಾಲಿದ್ದರೇನು? katteya moleyalli khaṇḍuga hāliddarēnu mere plentifulness, without being useful, is but a heap of rubbish.
thick rough paper used for cartridges, for drawing, and for strong envelopes; cartridge paper.
any of various wolflike carnivores (family Hyaenidae), with powerful jaws, a bristly mane, short hind legs, and a characteristic shrill cry, fed on carrion; a hyena.
the creeper Aristolochia bracteata of Aristolochiaceae family (said to be an antidote to snake-bites).
(masc.) a member of a tribal community who sell items like corn, grain, woollen blankets, etc., carrying on donkey's back.
the community itself.
a hard, menial or tedious work or service with little or no reward; donkey's work.
to utter or express in a shout, as an ass.

the plant Aristolochia bracteolatea of Aristolochiaceae family; (sometimes mistaken for Helleborus niger of Ranunculaceae family the rhizomes of which were formerly used as a heart stimulant and cathartic; black hellebore).
a kind of medicinal plant.
a man who herds and takes care of dokeys.
= ಕತ್ತೆಕಿರುಬ.
the plant Lannea coromandelica (=Odina woodier) of Anacardiaceae family); Indian ash tree (?).
= ಕತ್ತೆಕಿರುಬ.
= ಕತ್ತೆಕೆಲಸ.
the small plant Trichodesma indicum of Boraginaceae family.
(fig.) a trifling or worthless thing.
the grass Chloris barbata of Poaceae family.
the tree Cananga odorota of Annonaceae family.
= ಕತ್ತೆಕಿರುಬನಗಿಡ.
a boastful talk about deeds, abilities, etc., either one's own or those of someone close to one, esp. in a manner showing too much pride and satisfaction; brag.
a kind of cloth.
to declare one's or those of someone close to one, achievements, possessions or abilities with indulgent pride and satisfaction; to boast.
the letter ' ಕ '.
one of the systems of classical dance in India, which blends the traditional Indian system with that of Muslim.
(masc.) a person who relates a story or account, esp. who recites the epics before gatherings of people; a sttory-teller; a narrator.
= ಕಥಕ್ಕಳಿ.
= ಕಥಕ್ಕಳಿ.
a system of dance-drama popular in Kēraḷa, the southernmost part of India.
narration - a) the act or process of narrating; the telling of a story or of happenings; b) a story or account; a narrative.
a poem of or having the nature of, narration; a narrative poem.
to tell a story in speech or writing; to give an account of happenings; to narrate.
the act of narrating a story or event.
that which is so narrated; a naration.
to tell a story in speech or writing; to give an account of happenings; to narrate.
an incidental story or narration of an event that comes as a part of a main one; a subordinate story.
a musical discourse of a long story (usu. a mythological one).

a story - a) an account of imaginary or past events; a narrative, tale or anecdote; b) a fictitious literary composition in prose or poetry, shorter than a novel; narrative; tale; c) the narrative or plot of a novel or play etc.; storyline.
the chief male character in a story, narrative poem, play, etc. a hero.
the agreement, correspondence or harmony that must exist through out in a story, novel etc.
= ಕಥಾನಾಯಕ.
the running, flow in the narration of a story.
a long and formal treatment of a subject, in speech or writing; a discourse.
the arrangement of the incidents in a play, novel, narrative poem, etc.; a plot.
an incident that happens in connection which something is said, referred or related.
the structure, arrangement of a play, novel, etc.
a collection of stories either of the same author or different authors chose by a compiler; an anthology.
the beginning of a story, novel or narration.
= ಕಥಾಯಿ.
a kind of cloth.
the course of conversation.
the act of narrating a story or incident.
a book in which all accounting transanctions are classified and entered separately and orderly.
= ಕಥಾಮುಖ.
the end or conclusion of a novel, story, etc.
a brief summary of a novel; the substance or essence of a novel, story, etc.; a precis.
= ಕಥಾಲಾಪ.
(masc.) a person who relates a story or account; a sttory-teller; a narrator.
said; told; narrated.
the stated value; the value that is printed or stamped on a product.
= ಕಥಿಸು.

a soft, silver-white, crystalline, metallic chemical element, malleable at ordinary temperatures, capable of a high polish, and used as an alloy in tinfoils, solders, utensils, type metals, superconducting magnets, etc. and in making tin plate: symbol, Sn; tin.
to tell a story in speech or writing; to give an account of happenings; to narrate.

a story - a) an account of imaginary or past events; a narrative, tale or anecdote; b) a fictitious literary composition in prose or poetry, shorter than a novel; narrative; tale; c) the past course of the life of a person or institution etc; d) the narrative or plot of a novel or play etc.; storyline; d) a mere tale, an account with no basis in fact.
ಕಥೆ ಮುಗಿಸು kathe mugisu (fig.) to completely spoil (something); 2. (fig.) to kill (someone).
to listen to a story or narration.
to tell a story in speech or writing; to give an account of happenings; to narrate.
fit to be narrated or written as a story.
that which is fit to be written as a story or narrated.
a movable structure for opening or closing an entrance, as to a building or room, that usu. turns on hinges; a door.

ಕದ ತಿನ್ನುವವನಿಗೆ ಹಪ್ಪಳ ಈಡೆ? kada tinnuvavanige happaḷa īḍe? hewho has eaten up a vat asks for the pipkin; ಕದ ತಿನ್ನುವವರ ಮನೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಹಪ್ಪಳ ಬಾಳುವುದೇ? kada tinnuvavara maneyalli happaḷa bāḷuvudē? = ಕದ ತಿನ್ನುವವನಿಗೆ ಹಪ್ಪಳ ಈಡೆ?
a visible mass of condensed watery vapour floating in the atmosphere high above the general level of the ground; a cloud.
full of vigor; strong, robust, hearty, etc. as a horse.
to open the door.
to allow someone or something to come or go in.
either side of the face below the eye and between the nose and ear; the cheek.
the tree Anthocephalus indicus (= A. cadamba, = Nauclea cadamba) of Rubiaceae family; cadamba tree.
a great number of people gathered at one place; a group; a multitude.
the small black round seed of the plant Brassica nigra (or B. juncea) used as a spice; mustard seed.
something made by mixing; a mixture; a mixing or being mixed.
boiled rice mixed with various spices and vegetables.
extreme confusion or disorder; want of order.
the powder made from the aromatic rhizome of the plant Curcuma longa, used as a yellow dye, for seasoning or in medicine; turmeric.
one of the dynasties of Karnāṭaka.
a kind of perfume.
a great number of people gathered at one place; a group; a multitude.
the plant Brassica nigra of Brassicaceae family, yielding small black round seeds which are used as a spice; mustard.
the flower of the tree Anthocephalus cadamba; cadamba flower.
a spicy cake, made using different pulses and fried in oil then soaked in curd.
a preparation of betel leaf, areca nut, lime, spices and perfume (ಕದಂಬ), used like chewing gum.
a particular kind of cryptogram.
a combination of different colours made to give a different or special effect to the object, used as on the stage esp. on a dancer.
a thievish, deceitful man; a cheat; a thief.
a structure of bamboo, metal, etc. covered by green leaves, canvas, etc. as a protection from the sun or rain; an awning; a canopy.
the act or quality of a deceitful man.
the act of shivering, a shivering movement; trembling.
to undergo trembling; to quiver; to shiver.
= ಕದಕತನ.
= ಕದಕದಿಸು.
to become dense (as a tree with leaves).
a waving of small lamps kept in water mixed with vermilion powder.
a lamp or lamps used for this purpose.
the act of perturbing, troubling or making (something) turbid.
to cause to disturb the relative position of the particles or parts of especially by a continued circular movement; to cause to move slightly or change the position of.
